title: A Penny’s Worth of Affection
description: When the Duke of Newbridge discovers an insipid pup is making eye on his betrothed, he decides to confront him in a duel, only to find himself facing the sister, Penelope Inglewood. Penelope vows never to let the ruthless duke touch even a single hair of her brother and save whatever is left of their family’s honour.In her quest, however, it seems the ruin gets worse as the dangerous yet intoxicating duke begins to make her feel emotions that are never there before.Will the Duke of Newbridge get his sweet revenge? Will Penelope save her brother, herself, and their family’s reputation?
author: Rosemary Ani
